bwwExcerpt: "I am a brother playing Lincoln. It's a stretch for anyone's imagination," explains an early-middle-aged Black male who makes a living impersonating Abraham Lincoln (with a suit, beard, top hat, and whiteface makeup) as part of a bizarre arcade attraction where patrons can reenact Lincoln's assassin...
